name: 3.4.1.05 Building Demand (Settlement, continuous)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: The citizens demand a particular building be built (01-75) or demolished (76-100). Select the building type randomly from those available for the settlement. If the demand is not met by the next Event phase, Unrest increases by 1. Alternatively, you can suppress the citizens' demands and negate the event by succeeding at a Loyalty check, but this reduces Loyalty by 2 and increases Unrest by 1.
